thread.title: BRIEF-Philippine's Competition Watchdog Says Looking At Uber-Grab Deal

title: BRIEF-Philippine's Competition Watchdog Says Looking At Uber-Grab Deal
text:
April 2, 2018 / 7:49 AM / in an hour BRIEF-Philippine's Competition Watchdog Says Looking At Uber-Grab Deal Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - Uber Technologies Inc: 
* UBER DEAL LIKELY TO HAVE FAR REACHING IMPACT ON RIDING PUBLIC, TRANSPORTATION SERVICES 
* PHILIPPINE’S COMPETITION WATCHDOG SAYS LOOKING AT THE DEAL CLOSELY WITH THE END VIEW OF POTENTIALLY REVIEWING IT FOR COMPETITION CONCERNS * SHARING MARKET 
* PHILIPPINE’S COMPETITION WATCHDOG SAYS IN THE EVENT THEY WILL NOT SUBMIT VOLUNTARILY TO PCC JURISDICTION, THE COMMISSION COULD LAUNCH REVIEW OR OPEN CASE THAT MAY BLOCK THE DEAL Further company coverage: (Reporting By Neil Jerome Morales)
